metadata.synopsis: Karlach and romance partner night scene after completing Forging of the Heart and if she chose the upgrade to have sex.
metadata.how_to_trigger: With Karlach in the party as a companion:1. oe datekarlach2. Open the camp debug book (Ctrl+Shift+8)3. Queue camp night -> NIGHT)Karlach_TheForgingOfTheHeart4. Go to camp and sleep.

117.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Fade to black.

(Note: The following descriptions of how this encounter happens are fluid; intuitions of the actors should take precedence. The described physical actions are a jumping off point rather than an end goal.)

This scene starts slowly. For all her talk, Karlach is a luxuriator, one who is fully aware how much work a simple touch can do. She approaches the player and places a hand on the small of their back, drawing them close. She puts her face in the player's neck and breathes in their scent, then kisses up their neck, to jaw bone, and across to mouth. She pauses to look deeply in the player's eyes, and smiles. Taking their face in her hand, she kisses them deeply. After a moment she begins tracing her hands from their ribs to their back, running a hand down their back to their ass, and holds their cheek/chin with the other hand. As the kissing gets more intense, Karlach starts to gain momentum. If avatar is female she might part avatar's legs with her knee and intiate some sexy grinding while continuing to kiss the player, one hand on player's hip. If avatar is male, she might collapse to the ground, player cross-legged, herself straddling player, and reach down with one hand to stroke the player. _Things escalate from there_

----

Karlach has not been able to be intimate with anyone for 10 years, so for her, sexually, a little goes a long way. A caress is enough to get her engine well and truly roaring, and sexual contact itself will be an experience of pure bliss. Karlach lingers on touches, on deep kissing, on a sense of sexual abundance and guilelessness that allows her to achieve creative flow within a sexual context. Slowness, luxuriousness, and sensuality are the name of the game.

Karalch is sexually powerful and confident - dominant energy but vanilla, ii.e. she would not engage in biting, choking, restraint, etc. However, she confidently maneuvers the player into her desired positions (in which she would flow between a more active and passive role without rigidity) and has no difficulty acting on her sexual intuitions. She is a  very congruent person who experiences sexual flow state-- lost in the moment, fully engaged in sensations, enjoying the pure physical joy of it all.NodeContext: This node precedes a fade-to-black that leads to an intimacy scene between Karlach and the player. Player has just told Karlach 'I thought you'd never ask' (to go to bed)

37.speaker: Karlach

8.speaker: Karlach

52.speaker: Player

9.speaker: Player

12.speaker: Karlach
12.text: Slow. To tell you the truth, I feel like I have two modes: Off and on, on, on.

80.speaker: Player
80.text: I want to talk about what Dammon said - about your engine burning out.

32.speaker: Karlach
32.text: Fuck yes I am. Especially while my ultimate fantasy is right within reach.

86.speaker: Karlach
86.text: Feather in my cap that I've survived this long without being able to be close to you.
